title: Did Motel 6 Turn Away a Soldier Because He Was Underage?
subtitle: Some motel chains have implemented policies under which they decline to provide rooms to persons under the age of 21 due to (what they perceive as) a greater potential for younger guests to cause damage to facilities and other kinds of trouble.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: An Atlanta Motel 6 outlet turned away a U.S. Army soldier because he was underage.
